00001 !  ===================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              VELOCITIES
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision$
00006 !
00007 !   Calculate velocities from accelerations
00008 ! 
00009 !   apply thermodynamic constraint according to ensemble
00010 !
00011 !
00012 !
00013 !  ===================================================================
00014 
00015 
00016 subroutine velocities(p_start,p_finish,delta_t)
00017 
00018 
00019   use physvars
00020   use utils
00021   implicit none
00022   include 'mpif.h'
00023 
00024   real, intent(in) :: delta_t
00025   integer, intent(in) :: p_start,p_finish  ! min, max particle nos.
00026 
00027   integer p, i, ne_loc, ierr
00028   real, dimension(nppm) :: accx, accy, accz
00029   real :: sum_vxe, sum_vye, sum_vze, sum_v2e, sum_2ve, Te0, Te_uncor, Ti0, Ti_uncor, chie, chii
00030   real :: sum_vxi, sum_vyi, sum_vzi, sum_v2i, sum_2vi, mass_eqm
00031   real :: global_v2e, global_v2i, gammah, delta_Te, delta_Ti, Te_loc
00032 
00033   !  Available ensemble modes
00034   !      1 = NVE - total energy conserved
00035 
00036 ! Accelerations
00037   do i=1,npp
00038      accx(i) = q(i)*ex(i)/m(i)
00039      accy(i) = q(i)*ey(i)/m(i)
00040      accz(i) = q(i)*ez(i)/m(i)
00041   end do
00042 
00043   ! unconstrained motion by default (scheme=1)
00044 
00045   do p = p_start, p_finish
00046      ux(p) = ux(p) + delta_t * accx(p)
00047      uy(p) = uy(p) + delta_t * accy(p)
00048      uz(p) = uz(p) + delta_t * accz(p)
00049   end do
00050 
00051 
00052 end subroutine velocities
